creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: Months ago, when all this started, I would have thought that by the end of summer things would be under control, that we would genuinely be looking at some form of stability. Instead, today more than at the beginning, I am filled with dread, and look to home as the last refuge.
title: August 13, 2020: Autonomous Zone
